reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Shelter support and essential items for affected displaced families across Yemen

description.narrative: Assisting the affected displaced families and improving the living conditions of the displaced Yemenis by providing shelter solutions and non-food items.

Distribution of a quantity of shelter materials through the Commission represented by (14,001) shelter bags, (4000) emergency shelters, and (2000) Tihama shelters for the benefit of 104406 beneficiaries.
Providing a quantity of accommodation materials through the Commission represented by (14,001) shelter bags, (4000) emergency shelters, and (2000) Tihama shelters.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
